name: Peter the Painter: Out of Control (GMTK Jam)
name_original: Peter the Painter: Out of Control (GMTK Jam)
description:
Get to your easel, but be careful not to run out of paint or you'll run "out of control". As your reward you'll have created a wonderful painting "out of your controls"

Controls:

     A D, or left right to walk,

     space to jump,

    left shift to restart 

This game was created in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam 2020!
